DOC.brief_summary: The study title , Manual Versus Electric Vacuum Aspiration Pregnancy Termination Between 10-14 week : A Randomized Trial , randomize trial compare procedure time manual electric vacuum aspiration surgical abortion 10 0/7 13 6/7 week gestation . Women present surgical abortion 10 0/7 13 6/7 week gestation randomize either undergo manual vacuum aspiration ( MVA ) electric vacuum aspiration ( EVA ) . The investigator hypothesize operative time increase use manual vacuum aspiration , compare electric vacuum aspiration , surgical abortion perform late first trimester ( 10 0/7 and-13 6/7 week ) .
DOC.brief_title: Manual Versus Electric Vacuum Aspiration Pregnancy Termination Between 10-14 Weeks
DOC.criteria: Between 10 0/7 13 6/7 week gestation Documented intrauterine pregnancy Presenting surgical induce abortion RHS Englishspeaking Age 18 old Spontaneous abortion Failed medical abortion Multiple gestation Uterine anomalies Lower uterine segment cervical myoma History 3 prior cesarean delivery BMI > 40 Having abortion procedure perform provider perform MVA EVA 10 0/7 13 6/7 week
